message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its benefits to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your desire for a lower price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? This considers both our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the middle ground, I would like to propose $11,000 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
